title: GoogleDrive: Move just deletes files
body:
Just lost a month's/4GB worth of photos. The files I can restore the files themselves from backup, but my albums, shares and related metadata are wrecked.

Furthermore, I validated with dry run this would work correctly, but the dry run did not actually list all operations (see below).

In particular, I'd have wished any deleted files would appear in my trash. I did not find a "use trash" option, which would have been nice.

This is a spectacularly bad experience for me.

> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
> rclone v1.30
> 
> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
> Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
> 64
> 
> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
> Google Drive
> 
> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
> rclone move --include '_201601_' nous:Photos/2016 nous:Photos/2016/2016-01
> 
> A log from the command with the `-v` flag (eg output from `rclone -v copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
> Since the files were deleted, here is a log with other files (useless info grepped out):
> rclone move -v --include '_Monde_' nous:Photos/2016 nous:Photos/2016/2016-01

2016/07/09 21:05:40 rclone: Version "v1.30" starting with parameters ["/bin/rclone" "move" "-v" "--include" "_Monde_" "nous:Photos/2016" "nous:Photos/2016/2016-01"]
2016/07/09 21:06:39 TapisMondeOxybul.jpg: Moved
2016/07/09 21:06:39 Waiting for deletions to finish
2016/07/09 21:06:58 
Transferred:            0Bytes (0Byte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:     1m17.7s

2016/07/09 21:07:19 2016-01/TapisMondeOxybul.jpg: Deleted
2016/07/09 21:07:21 
Transferred:            0Bytes (0Byte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 1
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:     1m40.6s
2016/07/09 21:07:21 Go routines at exit 6

I'm noticing "2016-01/TapisMondeOxybul.jpg: Deleted": Are we deleting the destination file !?

Also, with --dry-run:
2016/07/09 21:15:08 rclone: Version "v1.30" starting with parameters ["/bin/rclone" "move" "-v" "--dry-run" "--include" "_Eau_" "nous:Photos/2016" "nous:Photos/2016/2016-01"]
2016/07/09 21:15:48 TableSableEauOxybul.jpg: Not moving as --dry-run
2016/07/09 21:15:48 Waiting for deletions to finish
2016/07/09 21:16:10 
Transferred:            0Bytes (0Byte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:      1m1.6s

2016/07/09 21:16:10 TableSableEauOxybul.jpg: Not deleting as --dry-run
2016/07/09 21:16:20 
Transferred:            0Bytes (0Byte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:     1m12.2s
2016/07/09 21:16:20 Go routines at exit 6

Notice how this time, "TableSableEauOxybul.jpg: Not deleting as --dry-run" the deleted file does not see, to be the destiation file
